alert.note: Alert for Coryell; McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 2:52PM CDT until April 28 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MCLENNAN AND CENTRAL CORYELL COUNTIES... At 251 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Gatesville, moving east at 45 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR GATESVILLE AND OGLESBY. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Gatesville, McGregor, Crawford, Fort Gates, Oglesby, South Mountain, Whitson, Osage, Arnett, Coryell City, Purmela, Levita, South Purmela and Ireland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Texas.
